SGBVHighlights.GeneralHighlights: APM for GBV has attended GBV WG meeting through zoom. During the meeting, the attendees shared their updates and services.
APM for GBV and CLC-Domiz manager have attended GBVIMS task force meeting and data analysis through Zoom.
CLC/Bardarash center manager has attended UNHCR online monthly Bardarash protection meeting.
CLC/ Bardarash center manager has attended monthly CCCM meeting with camp management.

CLC-Gawilan social worker has attended Gawilan monthly meeting which was conducted by camp management in camp management office during the meeting all updates from other agencies shared with activities, plans for January and challenges inside the camp.
CLC-Manager has attended monthly CCM meeting that was online, during the meeting updates and more plans for the camp have been discussed for 2021.
CPO has attended Child Protection Working Group meeting through Zoom.
CPO has attended Child Protection Working Group meeting through Zoom.
CPO has attended Camp Coordination meeting at Gawilan camp on 25th January 2021.

HealthHighlights.GeneralHighlights: we participated in the health cluster meeting on 27 of Feb. 2021 in Duhok DOH in the presence of DOH dirctor and preventative health dirctor in addition to all other partener NGOs , we discussed all challnges that we faced as health sector in 2020 and how we can overcome them in 2021 in presnces one of the most serious situation in the world (Covid-19). d

we participated in mental health work plan meeting  that held in Duhok -DOH on 19 of Feb -2021 , we discussed the servicse that should be continuously provided for mental health pepole in addtion to the new strategy that should be flowed to decrease the incidence of sucidal tendencies among pepole of the camps specially young girls .
